name: Malo Demo
description:
This is a prototype  of an RPG i´ll probably work on to complete.

Use WASD or arrows to move, SPACE to attack.

The game is in Spanish. I would add  a languaje detector or something in the final version if it´s worth it, when I learn how to do it properly, but it doesn´t have too much dialog anyway.

Any thoughts are more than welcome since this is my first upload on this page and I don´t even know what I should write in this box.
